titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Archive of Documentary Arts Administrative Collection, 2000-2014 RL.11746

publicationstmt.publisher: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-03-09 13:49:34 -0500.

repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

did.unittitle: Archive of Documentary Arts administrative collection
did.abstract: Exhibit posters and other publicity materials associated with the Archive of Documentary Arts programming at Duke University.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Materials compiled by curators Kirsten Johnson and Karen Glynn.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The ADA Administrative Collection was received by the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library as a transfer in 2014.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Archive of Documentary Arts Administrative Collection, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Accessions described in this collection guide: 2014-0087

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Collection of posters and other ephemera from exhibits and programs produced by the Archive of Documentary Arts at Duke University.

did.unittitle: Exhibit posters and other exhibit ephemera

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Exhibits represented include: Iraq: Perspectives; Deena Stryker; Gary Monroe; Paul Kwilecki.
